Context: Repelente que te mira por encima del hombro.
English: By the gods, what do my eyes see? / Oh Sweetheart, what do my eyes see? <bounce>( ° ͟ʖ °)
Spanish: Oh, Dios mío, ¿pero qué ven mis ojos? <bounce>( ° ͟ʖ °)
German: Bei den Göttern, was sehen meine Augen?

English: How dare you walk arround dressed in such "clothes"?
German: Wie kannst du es wagen mit solchen Kleidern zu gehen?

English: Fashion is important, even if you think otherwise. {shake}(??_?)
Spanish: La moda es importante, aunque no lo creas. {shake}(??_?)
German: Mode ist wichtig, auch wenn du das nicht glauben willst.

English: Look, honey, let me take care of that for you, will you? {shake}( ?° ?? ?°)
Spanish: Mira, cariño, vamos a arreglar esto.

English: Choose one of your liking, darling.
Spanish: Elige las prendas que más te gusten.

English: Alrighty, who am I to judge? Be back as soon as you can!  <bounce>^‿^
Spanish: Mmmm, bueno, si te gusta ir así, adelante. ¡No tardes en volver! <bounce>^‿^

English: It is my pleasure to see you again, honey {shake}(? ?° ??? ?°)?
Come come don't be shy, take a look. It's all four you. {shake}( ?° ?? ?°)
Spanish: Venga, mira todo lo que tengo. Es todo para tí. {shake}( ?° ?? ?°)
